data.name: Kin's Chronicle Demo
data.detailed_description: The demo for Kin's Chronicle has over a dozen recruitable monsters and non-player characters, and introduces you to the story, Zodiac, Tarot, and enemy Traits systems.
data.about_the_game: The demo for Kin's Chronicle has over a dozen recruitable monsters and non-player characters, and introduces you to the story, Zodiac, Tarot, and enemy Traits systems.
data.short_description: The demo for Kin's Chronicle has over a dozen recruitable monsters and non-player characters, and introduces you to the story, Zodiac, Tarot, and enemy Traits systems.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 2GB or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
